column4: Tesla to recall 2 700 Model X SUVs over seat issue
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Motors Inc  will recall 2 700 Model X sport utility vehicles in the United States due to a faulty locking hinge in the third-row seats that increases the risk the seats could fall forward in a crash  the electric car maker said on Monday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla to recall 2 700 Model X SUVs over seat issue
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  April 11 Tesla Motors Inc  will recall 2 700 Model X sport utility vehicles in the United States due to a faulty locking hinge in the third-row seats that increases the risk the seats could fall forward in a crash  the electric car maker said on Monday.

column4: Tesla to voluntarily recall 2 700 Model X SUVs over seat issue
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  April 11 Tesla Motors Inc  said on Monday it was issuing a voluntary recall of 2 700 Model X sport utility vehicles in the United States due to a faulty locking hinge in the third-row seats that increases the risk the seats could fall forward in a crash.
